name: ListItemFooterComponent

inputsClass.name: footer
inputsClass.rawdescription:
A simple string that can be used instead
of content projection.
inputsClass.description: A simple string that can be used instead of content projection.

description:
The footer can be used with either content projection or a simple string as an input.

Example :
<c8y-li>
  Content
  <c8y-li-footer>I am a footer</c8y-li-footer>
</c8y-li>
rawdescription:
The footer can be used with either content projection
or a simple string as an input.

```html
<c8y-li>
  Content
  <c8y-li-footer>I am a footer</c8y-li-footer>
</c8y-li>
```
